dict.acceptation: 朋友，友人；资助者；助手；近亲；

sent.orig: Friendliness is a subderivative from friendly which is derived from friend. friendliness.
sent.trans: 是来自friendly的次衍生字，而friendly是由friend衍生而来的。

sent.orig: Thy friend has a friend and thy friend's friend has a friend so be discreet.
sent.trans: 你的朋友有朋友，朋友的朋友又有朋友，所以要谨慎小心。

sent.orig: A friend that ai not in need is a friend indeed.
sent.trans: 金钱上没有困难的朋友才是真朋友。

sent.orig: First of all you are my friend, but had never met a friend.
sent.trans: 您首先是我的朋友，而且是从未谋面的朋友。

sent.orig: Ask your friend to clap his hands. Cover your ears. Can you hear your friend clapping?
sent.trans: 请你的朋友拍拍手，捂住你的耳朵，你能听到你朋友的拍手声吗？
